greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1/(1-4*x+x^3).
comment: A transform of A000302 under the mapping g(x)->(1/(1+x^3))*g(x/(1+x^3)).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,0,-1).
maple: K:=1/(1+4*z-z^3): Kser:=series(K, z=0, 30): seq(abs(coeff(Kser, z, n)), n= 0..23); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 08 2007
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Oct 20 2004
